attributes.action: Address the small boats arriving on our shores daily.
attributes.additional_details:
We feel that the economical cost which is being spent daily on the migrants arriving illegal into this country could be put to better use. 

Our resourse & services are stretched to breaking point. The NHS, schools, housing to name a few are dangerously on the verge of collapse. 

I'm sure the people signing this would rather see the money spent on our services first. Or on our elderly who had the winter fuel allowance cancelled. 

We want the British peoples concerns addressed before migrants.
attributes.background: We want the goverment to stop all immigration into the UK until the small boat problem is addressed.A solution in place to ensure the boats with migrants are no longer allowed to stay if they arrive here without following the application process like everyone else.We ask for deportation if required.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709678
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700824
